articles.author: MIKE STOBBE
articles.title: Don’t expect human life expectancy to grow much more, researcher says - The Associated Press
articles.description: A new study suggests that humanity is hitting the upper limit of life expectancy. Advances in medical technology and genetic research are not not translating into marked jumps in lifespan overall. That's according to researchers who found shrinking longevity …
articles.content:
NEW YORK (AP) Humanity is hitting the upper limit of life expectancy, according to a new study.
Advances in medical technology and genetic research not to mention larger numbers of people making it … [+3856 chars]
